text: ‘Apani amake ye adesa karechena ta chara taderake ami kichu'i balini, ta e'i ye, tomara amara raba o tomadera raba allah‌ra ibadata kara ebam yatadina ami tadera madhye chilama tatadina ami chilama tadera kaja-karmera saksi, kintu yakhana apani amake tule nilena [1] takhana apani'i to chilena tadera kaja-karmera tattbabadhayaka ebam apani'i saba bisaye saksi [2].’
